cards.name: Ebb and Flow
cards.description:
Retain.
Enter a random Stance.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Heroic Strike
cards.description:
Deal 10 (14) damage.
Add a Miracle into your hand.

cards.name: Predict
cards.description:
Guess the type of your draw pile's top card.
If correct, play it (, otherwise Scry 3).

cards.name: Back to Basics
cards.description: If you have 5 or more kobepurple:Common cards in your hand at the start of your turn, gain 6 (9) Block.

cards.name: Choreograph
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage.
At the end of this turn, Retain up to 1 (2) card (cards).
Upgrade it (them) for the rest of combat.

cards.name: Conundrum
cards.description: If the enemy has Weak, apply 4 (6) Vulnerable, otherwise apply 2 Weak.

cards.name: Fathom
cards.description: Scry the bottom 4 (6) cards of your draw pile, then put its bottom card into your hand.

cards.name: Neural Overload
cards.description:
Apply 6 (9) Mark.
ALL Marked enemies lose 4 (5) Strength this turn.

cards.name: Relentless
cards.description: Whenever you play your sixth card each turn, draw 2 cards and gain [W].

cards.name: Synchronize
cards.description:
Wrath: Gain 2 (3) Strength.
Calm: Gain 2 (3) Dexterity.
Divinity: Gain  (3 Regen and) 1 Intangible.

cards.name: Ward
cards.description: Gain Block equal to twice the amount of [W] gained this turn. (+!M!.)

cards.name: Condemn
cards.description: If you are in Divinity, halve each enemy's HP, otherwise deal 4 damage 4 (5) times.

cards.name: Ecstasy
cards.description:
Gain 4 Vigor.
Gain Mantra equal to your Vigor.
~~- Exhaust. -~~

cards.name: Foreshadow
cards.description:
Next turn, your first card is played twice.
~~- End your turn. -~~

cards.name: Know Yourself
cards.description:
(Retain.)
Duplicate the leftmost non-Rare card in your hand.
Exhaust.

keywords.name: Common
keywords.description: Starter cards and created cards are Common. Curses and Statuses are not.
